title: Five or More Cartel Members Arrested in Coahuila
name: Five or More Cartel Members Arrested in Coahuila
description: This data shows the where five or more cartel members were arrested during one event in Coahuila, Mexico from 09/15/2011 to 12/14/2011.

properties.security operations specs: Soldiers responded to a citizen complaint of criminal activity in the area.  When they went to investigate, they arrested ten people and seized various items.
properties.event summary: 10/05/2011: On Wednesday, in Piedras Negras, Coahuila, Mexico, in response to a citizen complaint, soldiers assigned to the 6th Military Zone of IV Military region arrested ten people.  During the arrest the following items were seized: 80 packages of marijuana weighing 520 kilograms, two vehicles, and personal property.
properties.event title: Military Make Arrests and Seizes Marijuana in Piedras Negras
properties.opinfo: Soldiers assigned to the 6th Military Zone of IV Military Region were responsible for conducting the military operation.
properties.location: The military operation took place in Piedras Negras, Coahuila, Mexico.

properties.event summary: 10/06/2011: On Thursday on Calle 16 de Septiembre between Francisco Villa and Emilio Zapata, Colonia Ejido de Piedras Negras, Ejido de Piedras Negras Municipality, Coahuila, Mexico, Mexican Army personnel arrested eight people for possession of marijuana. One suspect showed the personnel where the drugs and other seven people were. The suspects arrested were as follows: Jose Hernandez-Baltazar, Guadalupe Urista-Garibay, Jose Alfredo Rodriguez-Esquivel, Jose Ramirez-Valladares, Jose Alejandro Cena Torres-Pavon, Javier Hernandez-Morones, Angel Gabriel Urista-Garibay, and Edmundo Bermea de Leon. 80 packages of marijuana secured with red tape weighing a total of 528.8 kilograms were seized along with a red pick-up truck and a maroon Jeep Grand Cherokee.
properties.event title: Mexican Army Arrests Eight for Possession of Marijuana in Coahuila, Mexico
properties.opinfo: Mexican Army officials carried out the arrests.
properties.location: The individuals were arrested on 16 de Septiembre Street, Piedras Negras, Coahuila, Mexico.
